title: Equipment Rental
subtitle: Professional equipment rental service
description: E-Do Studio offers high-quality photo and video equipment rental services. We directly rent the professional equipment you need, ensuring access to superior quality gear for all your creative projects.

categories.title: Photo & Video
categories.description: Professional cameras, photography equipment, lenses and accessories for your productions.

categories.title: Lighting
categories.description: Professional lighting equipment for all types of shoots and filming.

categories.title: Digipack (Digitech)
categories.description: Digital solutions and technical equipment for data management and workflow.

categories.title: Production Equipment
categories.description: Clothing racks, tables, steamers and other essential equipment for your set.

categories.title: Catering
categories.description: Equipment for food service on your shoots and productions.

steps.title: Request
steps.description: Contact us with your specific equipment needs for your project.

steps.title: Selection
steps.description: We offer you equipment best suited to your needs and budget.

steps.title: Booking
steps.description: Finalize your reservation directly with our team.

steps.title: Usage
steps.description: Pick up and use the equipment for your project with the assurance of quality material.
